item.title: vCenter Server Converge Tool - How do I Converge an Environment Using the UI
item.description: vSphere 6.7 Update 2 is now available! Inside this update include enhancements to the vCenter Server Converge Tool. Let’s dive in and take a look at whats new and see how to converge a deployment using the new UI.
